line_1: Figg struck the first stroke, and with such a vast fury,
line_2: That he broke his huge weapon in twain, I assure you;

line_1: On all the sex she vents her fury,
line_2: Trys and condemns without a jury.

line_1: "Green! cries the other in a fury —
line_2: "'Tis green, 'tis green, Sir, I assure ye —

line_1: While others, with more fashionable fury,
line_2: Begin with turnpikes, and conclude with Fleury.
Nor suffers love to call a jury,
